title: ESA 35th Annual GRSG Conference and AGM
description:
Weâ€™re thrilled to announce our return to ESA for our 2024 event. Mark your calendars for another fantastic event on all things geological remote sensing, with a side of italian hospitality! This year our key conference themes will be:

    Mine site closure and rehabilitation
    Climate and environmental monitoring applications
    ESA Special: Geological Remote Sensing using ESA Satellites

Other geological remote sensing topics that do not directly fit into the above themes will also be considered
